alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 3:40AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN HARRISON AND SOUTHEASTERN HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 415 AM CDT... At 339 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Long Beach, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Long Beach, and Diamondhead. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 15 and 29. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
